Back to Edvard Grieg

Edvard Grieg

Sonata in E minor, op. 7

1865, revised 1887

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 18'

  • 1. Allegro moderato
  • 2. Andante molto
  • 3. Alla Menuetto, ma poco più lento
  • 4. Finale: Molto allegro

Grieg revised the sonata long after it was first published. The changes are generally minimal, other than a twenty-five bar cut in the exposition of the last movement.

Recommended editions

  • Samlede Verker (Peters) · I/2 · Andre originalkomposisjoner · ed. Dag Schjelderup-Ebbe
  • Henle · HN 604 · ed. Ernst-Günter Heinemann / Einar Steen-Nøkleberg
  • Könemann · K 267 · Sonata and Piano Pieces · ed. Thomas Aßmus
  • Peters · EP 3100d · Piano Works / IV / Miscellaneous Works
